data.name: AuthenticateAndSend_Description
data.value: Creates and sends a new email message

data.name: Delete_Description
data.value: Deletes an email message (or a list of email message) retrieved by a Retrieve email messages action

data.name: Email_Description
data.value: Automate sending, receiving and managing email messages through imap/smtp

data.name: Error_AttachmentNotFoundError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the specified attachment(s) were not found

data.name: Error_ConnectToImapServerError_Description
data.value: Indicates that there was a problem connecting to the IMAP server

data.name: Error_ConnectToImapServerError_FriendlyName
data.value: Failed to connect to IMAP server

data.name: Error_ImapServerAuthenticationError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem authenticating to the specified IMAP server

data.name: Error_ImapServerAuthenticationError_FriendlyName
data.value: Failed to authenticate to the IMAP server

data.name: Error_InvalidEmailAddressError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the specified email address is invalid

data.name: Error_InvalidMailFolderError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the specified mail folder wasn't found

data.name: Error_ProcessEmailsError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem with processing the specified email messages

data.name: Error_RetrieveEmailsError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem retrieving the email messages

data.name: Error_SaveAttachmentsError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem saving the attachments

data.name: Error_SendEmailError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem sending the email message

data.name: Group_EmailFilters_Description
data.value: The filters for the retrieved emails

data.name: MarkAsUnread_Description
data.value: Marks as unread an email message (or a list of email message) retrieved by a Retrieve email messages action

data.name: MarkAsUnread_Summary
data.value: Mark email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> as unread in account <USERNAME>

data.name: MarkAsUnreadAndMove_Description
data.value: Mark as unread and move an email message (or a list of email messages) retrieved by a Retrieve email messages action

data.name: MarkAsUnreadAndMove_Summary
data.value: Mark email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> as unread and move them to mail folder <MAILFOLDER> in account <USERNAME>

data.name: Move_Description
data.value: Move an email message (or a list of email messages) retrieved by a Retrieve email messages action

data.name: Move_Summary
data.value: Move email messages <EMAILSTOPROCESS> to mail folder <MAILFOLDER> in account <USERNAME>

data.name: ProcessEmails_AcceptUntrustedCertificates_Description
data.value: Specify whether untrusted certificates will be accepted

data.name: ProcessEmails_Description
data.value: Move, delete or mark as unread an email message (or a list of email messages) retrieved by a Retrieve email messages action

data.name: ProcessEmails_EmailsToProcess_Description
data.value: The email message or list of email messages to process. This should be a variable populated by a Retrieve email messages action

data.name: ProcessEmails_EnableSSL_Description
data.value: Specify whether to use a secure connection to communicate with the IMAP server

data.name: ProcessEmails_MailFolder_Description
data.value: The name of the mail folder to which the email messages will be moved

data.name: ProcessEmails_NeedsAuthentication_Description
data.value: Specify whether the server requires authentication

data.name: ProcessEmails_Operation_Description
data.value: The operation you want to perform on the specified email messages

data.name: ProcessEmails_Password_Description
data.value: The password of the email account to access

data.name: ProcessEmails_Port_Description
data.value: The port to use for the IMAP server. Usually this is port 993

data.name: ProcessEmails_Username_Description
data.value: The username of the email account to access

data.name: ProcessEmailsOperation_MarkAsUnreadAndMove_FriendlyName
data.value: Mark email messages as unread and move to mail folder

data.name: ProcessEmailsOperation_Move_FriendlyName
data.value: Move email messages to mail folder

data.name: Retrieve_Description
data.value: Retrieves email messages from an IMAP server

data.name: RetrieveAndSaveAttachments_Description
data.value: Retrieves email messages from an IMAP server and saves their attachments

data.name: RetrieveEmails_AcceptUntrustedCertificates_Description
data.value: Specify whether untrusted certificates will be accepted

data.name: RetrieveEmails_BodyContains_Description
data.value: The key phrase to find within the email body. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all email messages regardless of their content

data.name: RetrieveEmails_Description
data.value: Retrieves email messages from an IMAP server

data.name: RetrieveEmails_EnableSSL_Description
data.value: Specify whether to use a secure connection to communicate with the IMAP Server

data.name: RetrieveEmails_FromContains_Description
data.value: The full email address of the sender whose messages will be retrieved. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all messages regardless of the sender

data.name: RetrieveEmails_MailFolder_Description
data.value: The name of the IMAP mail folder (also known as 'mailBox') to retrieve messages from

data.name: RetrieveEmails_MailsToRetrieve_Description
data.value: Specify whether to retrieve all messages in the folder or only the unread ones

data.name: RetrieveEmails_MarkAsRead_Description
data.value: Specify whether to mark as read the retrieved messages or leave them as is

data.name: RetrieveEmails_NeedsAuthentication_Description
data.value: Specify whether the server requires authentication

data.name: RetrieveEmails_Password_Description
data.value: The password of the email account to access

data.name: RetrieveEmails_Port_Description
data.value: The port to use for the IMAP server. Usually this is port 993

data.name: RetrieveEmails_RetrievedEmails_Description
data.value: The retrieved email message for later processing as a list of email message objects

data.name: RetrieveEmails_SaveAttachments_Description
data.value: Specify whether to save the attachments of the email messages retrieved or not

data.name: RetrieveEmails_SaveAttachmentsInto_Description
data.value: The folder to save the attachments to

data.name: RetrieveEmails_SubjectContains_Description
data.value: The key phrase to find within the email subject. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all email messages regardless of their subject

data.name: RetrieveEmails_ToContains_Description
data.value: The full email address(es) of the recipient(s) (separated by space if more than one) for the messages that will be retrieved. Leave this attribute blank to retrieve all messages regardless of the recipient(s)

data.name: RetrieveEmails_Username_Description
data.value: The username of the email account to access

data.name: Send_Description
data.value: Creates and sends a new email message

data.name: SendEmail_AcceptUntrustedCertificates_Description
data.value: Specify whether untrusted certificates will be accepted

data.name: SendEmail_Attachments_Description
data.value: The full path of any attachment(s), or a file or a list of files. Multiple files should be enclosed in double quotes (") and separated by a space character

data.name: SendEmail_BCC_Description
data.value: The email(s) of the BCC (hidden) recipient(s). If more than one email is entered, the list of addresses should be separated by semi-colons

data.name: SendEmail_Body_Description
data.value: The body of the email message

data.name: SendEmail_CC_Description
data.value: The email(s) of the Cc recipient(s). If more than one email address is entered, the list of addresses should be separated by semi-colons

data.name: SendEmail_Description
data.value: Creates and sends a new email message

data.name: SendEmail_EnableSSL_Description
data.value: Specify whether or not to communicate with the server through a secure connection

data.name: SendEmail_IsBodyHtml_Description
data.value: Specify whether the body of the email message will be interpreted as HTML coding

data.name: SendEmail_NeedsAuthentication_Description
data.value: Specify whether the server requires authentication

data.name: SendEmail_Password_Description
data.value: The password of the email account to access

data.name: SendEmail_Port_Description
data.value: The port to use for the server. Usually this is port 25

data.name: SendEmail_SendTo_Description
data.value: The email address(es) of the recipient(s). If more than one email address is entered, the list of addresses should be separated by semi-colons

data.name: SendEmail_Subject_Description
data.value: The subject of the email message

data.name: SendEmail_Username_Description
data.value: The username of the email account to access

data.name: ErrorMessage_DeleteMessagesFailed
data.value: Deleting specified email messages failed on IMAP server {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToConnectToIMAP
data.value: Failed to connect to IMAP server {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToFilterMessages
data.value: Failed to filter messages on mail folder {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToRetrieveMessage
data.value: Failed to retrieve message with uid {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToSaveAttachments
data.value: Failed to save attachment(s) for message with uid {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FailedToSaveAttachmentsInDirectory
data.value: Failed to save attachment(s) in directory {0} for message with uid {1}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_MarkAndMoveMessagesFailed
data.value: Marking specified email messages as unread and moving them to folder {0} failed on IMAP server {1}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_MarkMessagesFailed
data.value: Marking specified email message as unread failed on IMAP server {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_MoveMessagesFailed
data.value: Moving specified email message to folder {0} failed on IMAP server {1}.
